queries.name: System Activity
queries.sql: SELECT AVERAGE_CPU_UTILIZATION as AVERAGE_CPU_UTILIZATION_REAL, AVERAGE_CPU_RATE as AVERAGE_CPU_RATE_REAL FROM TABLE(QSYS2.SYSTEM_ACTIVITY_INFO())

queries.name: number of remote connections
queries.sql: select COUNT(REMOTE_ADDRESS) as REMOTE_CONNECTIONS from qsys2.netstat_info where TCP_STATE = 'ESTABLISHED' AND REMOTE_ADDRESS != '::1' AND REMOTE_ADDRESS != '127.0.0.1'
